title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 221.7 - Declaration of quantity; nonconsumer packages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 221.7 - Declaration of quantity; nonconsumer packages

State Regulations
(a) General. Same as section
221.5
(a) of this

Part. (b) Location. A nonconsumer
package shall bear on the outside a declaration of the net quantity of
contents. Such declaration shall be in terms of the largest whole unit (see
section
221.5
[b]
of this

Part). (c) Terms--weight, liquid
measure, or count. Same as section
221.5
(f) of this

Part. (d) Metric units--weight, measure. Same as section
221.5
(h) of this

Part. (e) Symbols. Same as section
221.5
(i) of this

Part. (f) Customary units--weight, measure. Same as section
221.5
(j) of this

Part. (g) Symbols and
abbreviations. Same as section
221.5
(k) of this

Part. (h) Character of declaration; average. Same as section
221.5
(s) of this

Part. (i) Prominence and placement; nonconsumer packages; general. All information required to appear on a
nonconsumer package shall be definitely and clearly stated thereon in the

English language. Any required information that is either in hand lettering or
hand script shall be entirely clear and equal to printing in
legibility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
221.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
